Title: Enough Is Enough
Writer: Aaron Korsh (created by), Nora Zuckerman, Lilla Zuckerman
Actors: Gabriel Macht, Patrick J. Adams, Rick Hoffman, Meghan Markle
Plot: Louis uses his new leverage to become a name partner, rub Jessica and Harvey's noses in it, and promises to make Mike's life a living Hell until he breaks his will and resigns.
